column4: I"m having a weird problem. I rebooted my PC, and when it came up again, my "notification area" was in a weird place, actually on the desktop. I took a screen shot, http://img487.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshotyc1.png . Can someone help me get it where it's supposed to be again? :)
what about removing the notification area from the panel and adding a new one
